text: Annona oligocarpa is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is endemic to Ecuador. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Muriel, P. & Pitman, N. 2003. Annona oligocarpa. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
